name: Ley Line Disorder: Precision Strike Order
description: When the battle begins or when completing a task: Create a new task: Deal exactly 1/2/3/4 DMG to an opponent's character with a single attack. (This repeats in sequence)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the battle begins or when completing a task:</color> Create a new task: Deal exactly 1/2/3/4 DMG to an opponent's character with a single attack. (This repeats in sequence)
